text: Israel competed in the Winter Olympic Games for the first time at the 1994 Winter Olympics in Lillehammer, Norway. The lone Israeli competitor was Michael Shmerkin in men's figure skating.Israel at the 1994 Lillehammer Winter Games ==Results by event== ===Figure skating=== {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Gender !rowspan="2"|Athlete !colspan="9"|Final |- !Short Program !Rank !Free Skating !Total !Rank |- |Men's |Michael Shmerkin |align="center"|7.5 !align="center"|15 |align="center"|17.0 |align="center"|24.5 !align="center"|16 |} ==References== Category:Nations at the 1994 Winter Olympics 1994 Winter Olympics Winter Olympics
title: Israel at the 1994 Winter Olympics
